author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ionis And AstraZeneca Advance New Drug For NASH
text:
April 9 (Reuters) - Ionis Pharmaceuticals Inc:
* IONIS AND ASTRAZENECA ADVANCE NEW DRUG FOR NASH * IONIS PHARMACEUTICALS INC - EARNS $30 MLN LICENSE FEE FOR IONIS-AZ6-2.5-L RX
* IONIS PHARMACEUTICALS INC - ASTRAZENECA WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR FURTHER DEVELOPMENT & COMMERCIALIZATION OF IONIS-AZ6-2.5-LRX
* IONIS PHARMACEUTICALS INC - AS IONIS-AZ6-2.5-LRX ADVANCES, CO MAY RECEIVE UP TO $300 MLN IN ADDITIONAL DEVELOPMENT & REGULATORY MILESTONE PAYMENTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
